text: A White, White Day () is a 2019 Icelandic Danish Swedish drama movie directed by Hlynur Pálmason and starring Ingvar Eggert Sigurðsson, Ída Mekkín Hlynsdóttir, Hilmir Snær Guðnason. ==Other websites== * Category:2019 drama movies Category:Icelandic movies Category:Danish drama movies Category:Swedish drama movies
title: A White, White Day
